0x[0-9a-fA-F](?:\.[0-9a-fA-F]*|)[pP]
(?:0[xX]|U\+|#)[0-9a-fA-FGgRr]{2,}[uU]?[lL]{0,2}\b
\{[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-){3}[0-9a-fA-F]{12}\}
\b([a-zA-Z])\1{3,}\b

# test strings
"[abcABC]{2}[abcdeABCDE]{2,}?[f-j]*[x-z]*g?"
"[zZ]a[ab][a-z]+"
test\("\w+"
